Summary.Abstract: This data set contains bathymetry of Arctic fjords and Antarctic ice shelves based on measurements from the Sander Geophysics Airborne Inertially Referenced Gravimeter (AIRGrav) system. The data were collected as part of Operation IceBridge funded aircraft survey campaigns.

Related_URL.Description: Lamont-Doherty Earth Observatory Gravity Web page

DIF.DIF_Revision_History: 2014-10-22, Deann Miller, New data set. 2014-10-22, Deann Miller, New data set. 2015-07-23, Gloria Hicks, Added keyword for Drupal migration. 2015-09-24, Daniel Webster, Added HTTPS URL to Data Access 2014-12-02, Daniel Webster, Added Data Access URL for Reverb. 2015-02-04, Daniel Webster, Revised distribution size for addition of new data. 2015-02-11, Daniel Webster, Added Version 1.1 update info: On 11 February 2015, Version 1 was replaced by Version 1.1. The precision for lat and lon values in data file IGBTH4_20140207.csv was increased to 6 decimal places. 2015-10-30, Michon Scott, Keyword cleanup for Drupal migration.
